DOC.brief_summary: Following injury spinal cord , spinal circuit undergoes series adaptation . In parallel spinal circuit adaptation , muscular property also adapt . In human animal study , histochemical physiological evidence show paralyzed muscle transfer slow , fatigue-resistant fast , fatigable injury . Reversal neuromuscular property person SCI need resolve . Studies use high load electrical stimulation show reverse change muscular property , hypertrophy reversal fiber type transformation fail show reversal spinal circuitry function . Previous study find fast continuous passive motion ( CPM ) alter H reflex excitability human . Animal study find passive cycling passive stretch delayed atrophy influenced transition type I IIa MHC . Theses finding lead hypothesis mechanical stimulation might able reverse spinal circuitry muscular property SCI confirm human study . The purpose project investigate effect mechanical stimulation fast CPM reverse adaptation human paralyzed muscle SCI .
DOC.brief_title: The Reversal Neuromuscular Adaptation Human With Spinal Cord Injury II
